trans-unit.source: Defines methods for reading the parts of a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> and also for limited types of writing to the document.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
The definition that is added.
Flushes the package <xref:System.IO.Stream> and also commits an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> to the package.
Gets the zero-based position of the document in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the document location in the sequence.
Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DocumentStructure" name="DocumentStructure" href=""></xref> part, if one exists, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document does not need to have a Document Structure part.

An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure"></xref> that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DocumentStructure" name="DocumentStructure" href=""></xref> element, if one exists, and its child elements.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> readers, one reader for each page in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
A collection of fixed page readers, one reader for each page in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
Gets a reader for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the page.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader"></xref> for the page.
Gets the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>, if one exists, that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.

For more information about the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 2 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that contains the default printing options for the document; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no print ticket exists for the document.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
The definition that is removed.
Gets a collection of all the signature definitions that are associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of signature definitions, typically one for every person who signed or will sign the document.
Gets the thumbnail image, if a thumbnail exists, that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref> that represents the image.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the document.
